Text: Outstanding items for GSP Cc We are checking the status of two documents sent to you last week GSP LLC Action approving Merrill Lynch as Trustee This was sent to David and Cynthia on June th and needs to be signed by the appropriate person at Enron we understand that Enron is the sole member of GSP LLC Pension Investors Corp Intake Form This was sent to Louis and David on June th and needs to be completed and emailed or faxed to me or Pension Investors Corp Please return both documents as soon as possible Thanks Ann Ann E Murray LeBoeuf Lamb Greene MacRae N Laura St Suite Jacksonville FL Telephone Fax Email This email including attachments contains information that is confidential and may be protected by the attorneyclient or other privileges This email including attachments constitutes nonpublic information intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient please delete this email including attachments and notify me The unauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this email including attachments is prohibited and may be unlawful

revised fee schedule in parts Cc Louis Michelle and Cynthia Attached in Word is PICs revised Administration Agreement and Trust Accounting Agreement for your review The Administration Agreement states that PIC will provide third party administration and actuarial services to the Plan including calculation of contributions preparation of disclosures and annual reports maintenance of daytoday records and enrollment and termination of participants The Trust Accounting Agreement states that PIC will handle the trust accounting for the Plan please let us know if Enron prefers to use someone else for this task PIC has agreed to waive any charges for the GUST restatement of the Plan which will be taking place later this year Note the following basic administration charges Initially analysis design and consulting plan document SPD IRS submission fee for volume submitter document Ongoing annual administration plus per participant Additional charges will apply including nondiscrimination testing and actuarial computations at hour If the agreements meet with your approval GSPs HR Manager has already been authorized to sign any necessary documents Therefore Louis should sign where indicated and return the originals to Kevin Glueck Pension Investors Corporation Hollywood Blvd Suite A Hollywood FL along with a retainer of for the initial design and plan document fees Please provide copies to us Please let us know if you have questions or you may contact Kevin Glueck at PIC directly at ext Thanks Ann Ann E Murray LeBoeuf Lamb Greene MacRae N Laura St Suite Jacksonville FL Telephone Fax
